attributes.action: Wish for Simon Cowell to become Sir Simon Cowell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make Simon Cowell a Knight because of the work he has done for music and bussiness in the UK. He has brought a number of music acts and TV programmes to the world and made the UK a lot of money. Simon has worked his way up and his no messing about give it to you  straight ways are just what the country needs now and to make him a Knight would put him with other greats.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
